=== Ubuntu Translations Coordinators ===

This page functions as the place where the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-translations-coordinators|Ubuntu Translation Coordinators]]</nowiki> can write the documentation needed, for them and the rest of the community to perform certain (administrative) tasks related to the translation of Ubuntu.

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-translations-coordinators|Launchpad page]]</nowiki>
